mapper.insert: insert into exam(courseid, exam_title, question_num, question_score, start_time, end_time) VALUE (#{courseid},#{exam_title},#{question_num},#{question_score},#{start_time},#{end_time})
insert into question(examid, question_num, question_description, correct_answer) VALUE (#{examid},#{question_num},#{question_description},#{correct_answer})
insert into possible_answer(examid, question_num, possible_answer_num, description) VALUE (#{examid},#{question_num},#{possible_answer_num},#{description})
mapper.select: SELECT correct_answer FROM question WHERE examid=#{examid} AND question_num=#{question_num}
SELECT possible_answer_num,description FROM possible_answer WHERE examid=#{examid} AND question_num=#{question_num}
